name: LD38 - a Small World - Rebuild
description:
My first Ludum dare, completed with mere minutes to spare.
It's a fairly simple Tile Building game, but there are several secret interactions to be discovered!

It's very easy to fail early on if you overspend mana, I would recommend getting some resource income by summoning a forest and a mountain, and focus on population growth early to get a mana income up to 10, at which point you can freely expand.
